name: Christian Carrasco
summary: Senior Full Stack Engineer with 8+ years of experience building scalable web applications, cloud-native solutions, and high-performance user interfaces. Expert in React, Next.js, Node.js, Nest.js, and TypeScript, with strong experience in backend architecture, API design, and microservices. Skilled in cloud deployments (AWS), DevOps, and CI/CD pipelines. Since 2023, actively integrating AI/LLM models into applications to deliver intelligent, next-generation features. Experienced across startups and enterprise environments, delivering high-quality, production-ready systems with a focus on scalability, performance, and maintainability. Recognized for problem-solving, architectural vision, mentorship, and continuous learning.
